h2_title: Yaoguai Queen Boss Fight - Kang-Jin Loong
content: Another wild tail slam attack will come when the boss rapidly spins in a front circle while facing you, building up momentum from several rotations to finally slam their tail down from above.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Queen Boss Fight - Kang-Jin Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Another wild tail slam attack will come when the boss rapidly spins in a front circle while facing you, building up momentum from several rotations to finally slam their tail down from above.
